Sentencas: One of the most important challenges for further development of solid oxide fuel cells is to develop new electrolytes which operate at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Pr-doped ceria nanoparticles as intermediate temperature ionic conductors

Sentencas: In this sense, the Ce0.8Pr0.2O2 material has been synthesized for the first time using polyol-mediated synthesis route, obtaining well crystallized nanoparticles with a particle size of 2-3 nm.
Titulo: Pr-doped ceria nanoparticles as intermediate temperature ionic conductors

Sentencas: In order to study the thermomechanical properties of the sample, dilatometric measurements have been carried out.
Titulo: Pr-doped ceria nanoparticles as intermediate temperature ionic conductors

Sentencas: The Ce0.8Pr0.2O2 nanostructured sample exhibits a thermal expansion coefficient of 22.1 x 10(-6) K-1, making this material one of the first electrolytes compatible with cobaltites and double perovskites, the most promising cathodes for these devices.
Titulo: Pr-doped ceria nanoparticles as intermediate temperature ionic conductors

Sentencas: The electrochemical behavior of these nanoparticles has been studied and the influence of the particle size on the material properties has been also analyzed.
Titulo: Pr-doped ceria nanoparticles as intermediate temperature ionic conductors

Sentencas: The nanostructured electrolyte presents bulk conductivity much higher than microstructured samples, giving rise to an improvement of the electrolyte performance.
Titulo: Pr-doped ceria nanoparticles as intermediate temperature ionic conductors

Sentencas: Experimental results indicate that Ce0.8Pr0.2O2 nanoparticles exhibit a lot of advantages for their employment as electrolyte material in terms of smaller particle size and better electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Pr-doped ceria nanoparticles as intermediate temperature ionic conductors
